title: Font used on Band of Horses cover
content:
Dear Typophiles

I am looking for this font or close to it. It is the font used on the Band of Horses cover.

Link to cover:  
 [http://www.subpop.com/assets/images/3551.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100409151856/http:/www.subpop.com/assets/images/3551.jpg "http://www.subpop.com/assets/images/3551.jpg")

Thanks for all your help :)
author: breuer

comments.content: Thank you so much Paul!! Just bought it.
